pddl4j.util

Class AdjacencyMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • pddl4j.util.AdjacencyMatrix

  • public class AdjacencyMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements an adjacency matrix to represent constraints and order graphs

    • Field Summary

      The size of the adjacency matrix

                                               java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> A1)

        Parameters:
        A0 - The first task list in an order constraint
        A1 - The second task list in an order constraint
        Returns:
        The set Bi containing tasks as defined in UMCP
